title: Where Excellence and Convenience Meet.  Harbor Crest | Euclid
map_address: 24453 Lakeshore Blvd Euclid, OH 44123 near E 244 St.
app_fee: $35 application fee-credit, rental history and criminal background check
posting_body: Living at Harbor Crest On The Lake Is Like Living On a Vacation Resort!!
Wake up to spectacular views of gorgeous sunrises and say good night to brilliant sunsets over Lake Erie.
Along with an amazing list of community amenities, we also offer the added convenience of online rental payment and maintenance requests.
Visit Harbor Crest and we know you will agree - it is just what you are looking for!
We understand how tedious the moving process can be and we are dedicated to making it as smooth as possible for you.

Feel free to log onto www (dot) HarborCrestAPTS (dot) com and view our floor plans, take a virtual tour, and even use the furniture arranger to see how beautiful your furniture will look in suite unit number.
